機体に乗り込み、戻ってくると、\nすでに全員休憩を終わらせて出発の準備を終えてい:
I boarded the aircraft, and when I came back...
Everyone had already finished their break and had finished preparing to leave.
あ、エヴィちゃんも%usernameusernameuserna%さんもお帰りな:
Oh, welcome back, Eve and %usernameusernameuserna%!
All right, let's get going!
何か秘密の作戦だったの？\n……あっ、あんまり聞いちゃダメだよね！:
Was it some kind of secret operation?
...Ah, I shouldn't ask too much!
あはは。\nまあ、そんな感じかな。:
Ahaha.
Well, I guess that's about it.
へえ、怪しい雰囲気じゃない……色々と聞きたいわね！\nもしかして隠れて、一線越え:
Wow, there's no suspicious atmosphere here... I'd love to hear all kinds of things!
Maybe she hid and crossed the line?
なんですか、その含み笑い！？\n%usernameusernameuserna%:
What's with that implication?!
%usernameusernameuserna%, what happened?!
おい、エヴィ！ 妙な言い方するな！ 変な誤解招いてるだろ！: Hey, Eve! Don't say it like that! You're causing a weird misunderstanding!
%usernameusernameuserna%ってば、すごく『スパルタ』だった:
%usernameusernameuserna% was really a 'spartan'.
She'd hit me where it hurt, and she'd even order me to show her with my actions.
でもね、それもまた%usernameusernameuserna%の優しさなんだ:
But you know, that's also %usernameusernameuserna%'s kindness,
I knew that... so I accepted it all.
どうしましょう！ エヴィちゃん、大人になるどころか、\n変な方向に目覚めちゃいま:
What should I do?! Eve, rather than growing up,
Did I wake up in a weird direction?!
もっと聞かせて！ インスピレーションがドバドバ溢れてくるわ！\nやっぱり芸術はリ:
Tell me more! I'm overflowing with inspiration!
Art really is libido!
わ、私も掘り下げ希望……！！: I-I want to dig deeper, too...!!
これ以上掘っても何も出てこんわ！ 勝手に掘っとけ！\nエヴィもわざとやってるだろ:
Digging any more won't get you anywhere! Dig whatever you want!
You're doing this on purpose too, aren't you, Eve?!
（というか、少し変わったか……？\n余裕を感じられるようになったというか……）:
(Actually, has she changed a little...?)
It's like I've become able to feel more confident...)
……あ、そうだ、シエナ！\n優しいシエナなら、ちゃんと誤解だって理解してくれるよ:
...Oh, right, Siena!
The kind Siena would understand that it was a misunderstanding, right?!
ヤバたんです！ 目を開けたまま気絶しちゃってます！！: This is bad! He's unconscious with his eyes open!!
あら、刺激が強すぎちゃったかしら？: Oh, is that too much stimulation?
ほんとコスパ悪い会話だなぁ……ふふっ。: This really is a bad conversation... Hehe.
――そんなバカなやり取りをしたあと、一同は機体に乗り込み、\nエヴィのこれからの:
—After that stupid exchange, everyone boarded the aircraft
They listened intently to Eve's plan for the future.
それじゃ、エヴィちゃん。これからどうするのか、よろおねです！: Well then, Eve. What are you going to do now? I'm so glad!
うん。いろいろ考えたんだけど――: Yeah. I've thought about it a lot, but...
と、口を開いたそのときだった。: Just as I open my mouth...
――こちら本部。トレブルクインテット、どうぞ。: This is HQ. Treburg Integrity, please.
エヴィが言いかけたところで、ノイズと共に音声が割って入った。: Just as Eve was about to speak, a voice cut in along with the static
……視聴者数はいまだにトリニティジュエルが１．５倍ですが、\n少し問題が起きたの:
...The number of viewers is still 1.5 times higher than Trinity Jewel, but...
There's been a bit of a problem, so I'll share some information with you.
続く言葉に、軽口を叩いていたトレブルクインテットたちに緊張が走る。\nいわく、快:
The words that followed made the Treburg Intets, who had been bantering, tense up.
According to him, something had happened to Trinity Jewel, who had been continuing her rapid advance.
深層でメイズシフターの大規模集団と遭遇、現在も交戦中だという。\n完全に足止めを:
It was said that they had encountered a large-scale group of maise shifters in the deep levels and were still engaged even now.
They've completely stopped us, and the line connecting us to the rear is being cut off.
……それはマズいね。あの速度で進行してたってことは、\n長期戦とかを考えていない:
...That's not good. If they were advancing at that speed,
She shouldn't be thinking about long-term battles.
それに深層だと、敵の数も上層より圧倒的に多いはずだよね。\n……間違いなく、逃げ:
And in the Deep Levels, the enemy's numbers should be overwhelmingly higher than the Upper Tier.
...There's no way I can run away.
そうですね……事実、連絡線も破壊されて通信状況も悪くなっています。\n本部では試:
That's right... In fact, the communication lines have been destroyed, and communications are getting worse.
HQ is currently discussing whether to suspend the exam and send help...
分かった。トレブルクインテットは進行ルートを変更、\n〈r=メインシャフト〉主縦:
"Understood." Treburg Integrity changed its route,
Use the 〈r=メインシャフト〉 Main Shaft </r> to head to the scene.
エヴィちゃん……いいの？ ここまで安全第一で慎重に来たのに\nいきなり〈r=メイ:
Eve... Are you sure? We've come this far with safety first and foremost.
I can't believe she's suddenly using the 〈r=メインシャフト〉 Main Shaft </r>.
……救援にのんびりなんてしてられないからね。: ...I can't just sit back and help out.
なるほど……いい思い切りをみせてくれるじゃない。\nさすがうちの参謀ね。リソース:
I see... That's a good show of determination.
That's our staff officer for you. Do you have enough resources?
うん、温存してきたおかげで十分。\nあとはリーダーの最終判断かな？:
Yeah, thanks to saving it, that's enough.

きっとレイヴェルちゃん達は大変な状況です！\nそんな状況で、何もしないなんてぽよ:
I'm sure Ravel and the others are in a tough situation!
I can't just do nothing in a situation like that...!
リーダーも乗り気だし、それじゃあすぐに向かおう。: The leader's on board, so let's head there right away.
では……トレブルクインテット出撃開始です！\nトリニティ・ジュエルを助けましょう:
Well then... Treburg Integrity, let's begin the battle!
Let's save Trinity Jewel!
これまでの慎重な歩みとは打って変わり、\n速度を上げて移動を開始する。その最中、:
It was a far cry from the cautious steps she'd taken so far
I pick up speed and start moving. While I'm doing that, a secret line reaches me.
正直な話、トリニティ・ジュエルを包囲してるだろうメイズシフターを\n私達で突破で:
Honestly, the maise shifter that's probably besieging trinity jewel.
I'm just a little worried about whether we'll be able to break through.
『ほんの少し』で済んでる理由は？: Why is it just a little bit?
実は今私と通信してる人、戦術指揮の天才らしいよ。: Actually, the person who's communicating with me right now is a genius at tactical command.
天才って……ったく、甘えるのが上手くなったな。\nまあ、エンゲージ後の戦術指揮は:

さすが、教導指揮官。\n……これで不安じゃなくなったよ。:

安心しろ。トレブルクインテットの想いも、\n期待も……俺が傷つけさせん。:
